Vehicle.Name: Cat's Eye Multipurpose Sensor Suite
Vehicle.Description: [H3]CryonCorp Mk. I Cat's Eye Multipurpose Sensor Suite[h3] Please see page 46 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details. [P][I]Disclaimer: This is a piece of field equipment found in the Lead by Example Sourcebook. It is created as a stationary "vehicle" because it is the most appropriate format. While any mods or benefits are per the official source, the actual vehicle stats are an interpretation only and are not official. Feel free to modify them if you think any changes are required.[i]

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds [BO][BO] to any Perception, Computers, or Vigilance checks to detect incoming orbital air trafic within long range (planetary).
Adds [SE][SE] to Stealth checks made by land units approaching the device within long range (planetary).
